summary: Tested new features: 1) Listing ID displayed on listing cards (last 8 chars), 2) Featured verified listings API, 3) Homepage 'From Verified Sellers' section, 4) BadgeCelebrationModal component. Fixed homepage ListingCard to show listing IDs.
critical_code_review_comments: BadgeCelebrationModal: Component exists and is well-implemented with confetti animation, but it is not yet integrated into the app flow - needs to be triggered when a badge is awarded.
Homepage 'From Verified Sellers' section: Code is in place but shows empty because no verified sellers currently have active listings. Fallback to 'Verified Sellers' profiles also available.
updated_files: /app/frontend/app/(tabs)/index.tsx - Added listing ID display to homepage ListingCard component
context_for_next_testing_agent: 1) Listing IDs now show on all listing cards (last 8 characters with monospace font). 2) BadgeCelebrationModal component exists at /app/frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeCelebrationModal.tsx - ready to be integrated when badges are awarded. 3) Homepage shows 'From Verified Sellers' section when there are listings from verified sellers via /api/listings/featured-verified endpoint.

listing_id_on_cards.details: Listing ID now displays as 'ID: xxxxxxxx' (last 8 chars) on listing cards in the Recent Listings section. Uses monospace font. Added to homepage ListingCard component.
listing_id_on_cards.location: Homepage listing cards, bottom right corner

featured_verified_api.details: Returns listings from verified/premium sellers with seller info attached. Falls back to recent listings if no verified sellers have listings.

from_verified_sellers_section.details: Code implementation is complete in FeaturedSellersSection component. Currently shows empty because no verified sellers have active listings. Will display automatically when verified sellers post listings.

badge_celebration_modal.details: Full modal component with confetti animation, badge display, points earned, and 'Awesome!' close button. Not yet integrated into app flow - needs to be triggered when badge is awarded.

test_results.frontend_tests: Visual verification complete - listing IDs displaying correctly
